yA tava# taqnUriqya(gm) sA mayi# saqha nau$ vratapatE vraqtinO$rvraqtAniq yA tE# agnEq rudri#yA taqnUstayA# naH pAhiq tasyA$stEq svAhAq yA tE# agnE&yASaqyA ra#jASaqyA ha#rASaqyA taqnUrvar.Shi#ShThA gahvarEqShThO&graM 
~MvacOq apA#vadhIM tvEqShaM ~MvacOq apA#vadhIq(gg)q svAhA$ || 21
(tvayi#-catvAriq(gm)qSacca#) (A11)
